## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                             | Type                                    | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `border` | `border`  | The border style for the content area. Automatically set based on available space of the modal content. | `"both" \| "bottom" \| "none" \| "top"` | `'none'` |
